security_controls.integration_tips: Restrict log access, use checksums/signing for tamper detection, and separate duties for log management.
security_controls.verification_method: Access control review on log stores and integrity-check implementation tests.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: Configurable notifications (in-app, email) and integration-driven notifications (Slack, Teams)

security_controls.requirement: Verify notification mechanisms respect privacy settings and do not leak sensitive information. Provide user-configurable preferences and secure delivery channels.
security_controls.relevance: Directly applies to notifications and their privacy/security implications.
security_controls.integration_tips: Allow fine-grained notification preferences, redact sensitive content in notifications, and use secure channels for delivery (TLS, signed webhooks).
security_controls.verification_method: Review notification templates for PII, test opt-in/opt-out flows, and inspect webhook signing.

security_controls.requirement: Define notification and communication policies including handling of sensitive data in notifications.
security_controls.relevance: Encourages organizational policy controlling notification contents and channels.
security_controls.integration_tips: Document allowed notification types, classify sensitive content, and implement checks to prevent sensitive fields in messages.
security_controls.verification_method: Policy existence check and sample notification content review.

security_controls.requirement: Privacy compliance and controls for processing personal data in communications and notifications.
security_controls.relevance: Ensures notifications comply with privacy requirements when transmitting personal data.
security_controls.integration_tips: Document legal basis for sending notifications, obtain consents where required, and provide data minimization in notifications.
security_controls.verification_method: Privacy impact assessment and consent records.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: Performance and scalability goals: horizontal scaling, efficient sync, conflict resolution, and large-board performance

security_controls.requirement: Verify design for horizontal scalability, efficient synchronization, and resource isolation to maintain security and performance under load.
security_controls.relevance: Directly covers scalability, sync efficiency, and resource isolation required for high-performance collaborative systems.
security_controls.integration_tips: Design stateless services, use sharding/partitioning for large boards, instrument sync performance, and ensure security controls scale with capacity.
security_controls.verification_method: Scalability/load tests and review of architecture for statelessness and partitioning.

security_controls.requirement: Contingency and continuity planning for maintaining operations during scaling events and failures.
security_controls.relevance: Requires plans to maintain service during scaling/failure events to meet availability targets.
security_controls.integration_tips: Develop contingency plans for scale events, test failover and degradation scenarios, and include performance SLAs in runbooks.
security_controls.verification_method: Contingency plan tests and failover simulation outcomes.

security_controls.requirement: Capacity and performance management to ensure systems can scale and meet performance/security requirements.
security_controls.relevance: Operational control for capacity planning and ongoing performance management.
security_controls.integration_tips: Maintain capacity forecasts, automated scaling triggers, and continuous monitoring of sync latencies for large boards.
security_controls.verification_method: Capacity planning evidence and monitoring dashboards.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: Reporting and analytics (usage, activity logs, license/admin dashboards) with export capability

security_controls.requirement: Verify that reporting and analytics systems protect aggregated data, prevent leakage of PII, and support secure export and access controls.
security_controls.relevance: Applies to dashboards, exports and analytics with privacy and access concerns.
security_controls.integration_tips: Apply role-based access to dashboards, anonymize/pseudonymize PII in reports, and control export rights with audit logging.
security_controls.verification_method: Report content reviews for PII, access control tests, and export permission tests.

security_controls.requirement: Audit record generation and analysis for reporting systems and dashboards; ensure integrity and controlled access.
security_controls.relevance: Ensures analytics derive from trustworthy audit records and logs are protected.
security_controls.integration_tips: Ensure logs feeding analytics are integrity-protected and limit access to analytics data based on roles.
security_controls.verification_method: Validation of log feed integrity and access control audits on dashboards.

security_controls.requirement: Privacy requirements for processing personal data in reporting and analytics.
security_controls.relevance: Ensures compliance for analytics involving personal data, including exports.
security_controls.integration_tips: Maintain data processing records, implement pseudonymization, and enforce retention/erasures as required.
security_controls.verification_method: DPIA results and data processing records.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: Operational capabilities: backups, restore, monitoring, rate limiting, and DDoS mitigation

security_controls.requirement: Verify backup, restore, monitoring, rate limiting, and DoS mitigation are implemented to maintain availability and integrity of data and services.
security_controls.relevance: Directly maps to the operational capabilities requested, ensuring resilience and protection from DoS and data loss.
security_controls.integration_tips: Implement automated backups with periodic restore tests, centralized monitoring and alerting, rate limiting at API gateways, and DDoS protection (WAF/CDN).
security_controls.verification_method: Restore drills, monitoring configuration review, rate-limit effectiveness testing, and DDoS response exercises.

security_controls.requirement: Information system backup: ensure backups are performed, tested, and restorations validated to maintain data availability.
security_controls.relevance: Mandates backups and restore validation as part of contingency planning.
security_controls.integration_tips: Schedule regular backups, encrypt backups, and maintain tested restore procedures in runbooks.
security_controls.verification_method: Backup/restore test records and integrity checks.

security_controls.requirement: Denial of service protection and resource management controls for mitigating large-scale attacks.
security_controls.relevance: Specifies protections to mitigate DDoS—including rate limiting and resource management.
security_controls.integration_tips: Deploy API rate limiting, autoscaling, network-layer DDoS protections (scrubbing services) and implement resource quotas per tenant.
security_controls.verification_method: DDoS simulation tests, rate-limit verification and resource isolation tests.

security_controls.chapter: Information Security Aspects of Business Continuity
security_controls.requirement: Implement information security continuity including backup and restore procedures and protection against disruptions.
security_controls.relevance: Provides continuity planning guidance that includes backups and protection against disruptions like DDoS.
security_controls.integration_tips: Integrate information security into business continuity plans, test continuity plans regularly, and ensure roles are assigned for restore operations.
security_controls.verification_method: Business continuity test evidence and recovery time objective (RTO) verification.

cross_functional_controls.description: Centralized logging, tamper-evident logs, SIEM ingestion, alerting and retention policies to detect and investigate security events.
applies_to: Audit logging for user activity, changes, and administrative actions
Operational capabilities: backups, restore, monitoring, rate limiting, and DDoS mitigation
cross_functional_controls.implementation_guidance: Forward application, auth, and infrastructure logs to a centralized, access-controlled SIEM. Sign or checksum logs to detect tampering, configure alerts for anomalous activity, and retain logs per policy for forensic needs.

cross_functional_controls.description: Use strong TLS for all transports and encrypt sensitive data at rest using KMS-managed keys to protect confidentiality and integrity.
cross_functional_controls.implementation_guidance: Enforce TLS 1.2+ with secure cipher suites, use KMS for key management, rotate keys regularly, and apply envelope encryption for large assets.

cross_functional_controls.description: Validate and sanitize all inputs and apply context-aware output encoding to prevent XSS, injection, and malformed data affecting rendering.
cross_functional_controls.implementation_guidance: Adopt whitelist validation, use proven sanitizer libraries for HTML/SVG, and encode outputs per context (HTML, JS, URL).

cross_functional_controls.description: Enforce server-side RBAC/ACL checks, least privilege, ownership controls and auditable delegation/transfer mechanisms.
cross_functional_controls.implementation_guidance: Centralize authorization logic, maintain role/permission matrices, protect admin functions, and log/monitor changes to access control policies.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: User registration and login with email/password, SSO (SAML/OIDC), OAuth (Google/Microsoft) and optional multi-factor authentication

security_controls.requirement: Verify that authentication controls (including password, SSO, and multi-factor authentication) are implemented securely. Ensure secure password storage, account lockout, session management, and support for federated identity protocols like SAML and OIDC.
security_controls.relevance: Directly addresses secure authentication, SSO, OAuth and MFA required by the high-level requirement. Ensures secure storage, session handling and federated identity support.
security_controls.integration_tips: Use proven authentication libraries, enforce secure password hashing (e.g., bcrypt/Argon2), implement SAML/OIDC flows via vetted IdP libraries, and enable MFA as an option during login and for high-risk actions.
security_controls.verification_method: Review implementation against OWASP checklist, inspect password storage, test SSO flows (SAML/OIDC), and verify MFA enrolment and challenge behaviour in functional tests.

security_controls.requirement: Devices and users shall be uniquely identified and authenticated. Supports multi-factor authentication and federated authentication mechanisms per organizational policy.
security_controls.relevance: Specifies unique identification and support for MFA and federated authentication—aligns with requirement to support OAuth and SSO providers.
security_controls.integration_tips: Implement identity lifecycle per NIST guidance, require unique identifiers, integrate IdPs using secure OAuth/OIDC/SAML client libraries, and enable configurable MFA enforcement per policy.
security_controls.verification_method: Review identity management design, test MFA enforcement, and audit federated authentication configurations and logs.

security_controls.requirement: Use of privileged and non-privileged authentication methods including secure implementation of authentication mechanisms and supporting technologies (e.g., SSO).
security_controls.relevance: Reinforces organizational control over authentication methods and SSO usage; useful for policy and compliance mapping.
security_controls.integration_tips: Document authentication policies, include SSO and MFA in access control policies, and ensure contractual controls for external IdPs.
security_controls.verification_method: Policy review, configuration inspection, and evidence of enforced authentication methods across systems.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: Team and workspace management with role-based access controls (Owner, Admin, Member, Guest)

security_controls.requirement: Verify that role-based access control is implemented correctly. Ensure separation of duties, least privilege, and that role assignment and revocation are enforced server-side.
security_controls.relevance: Directly targets RBAC functionality (roles, separation of duties) required for team/workspace roles.
security_controls.integration_tips: Implement server-side RBAC checks for all actions, maintain role assignment workflows, and enforce least privilege for Owner/Admin/Member/Guest roles.
security_controls.verification_method: Role matrix review, unit/integration tests for authorization checks, and penetration tests to attempt privilege escalation.

security_controls.requirement: Account management: The organization manages information system accounts, including account types, roles, and privileges, and manages assignment and removal of access.
security_controls.relevance: Addresses lifecycle management of accounts and roles, covering team member onboarding/offboarding and role changes.
security_controls.integration_tips: Automate role assignment and revocation processes, integrate with provisioning workflows, and log role changes for audit.
security_controls.verification_method: Review account management procedures, test provisioning/deprovisioning, and inspect audit logs for role change events.

security_controls.requirement: Least privilege: The organization limits users' access to the minimum necessary to perform their duties.
security_controls.relevance: Enforces principle of least privilege for role definitions (Owner, Admin, Member, Guest).
security_controls.integration_tips: Define minimal permission sets per role, perform regular review of role capabilities, and use separation of duties controls where needed.
security_controls.verification_method: Permission audits, role-based access tests, and reviews of unneeded privileges.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: User profile management and organization-level settings

security_controls.requirement: Verify secure handling of user profile and account settings. Ensure personal data is protected, edits are authorized, and privacy settings are enforced.
security_controls.relevance: Covers secure modification and protection of profile data and enforcement of privacy settings at user and org level.
security_controls.integration_tips: Protect profile endpoints with authorization checks, validate profile input, and provide privacy toggles respecting least exposure of PII.
security_controls.verification_method: Functional tests for profile update endpoints, data-protection reviews, and privacy settings verification.

security_controls.requirement: The organization supports management of account attributes, including user profile information, and enforces authorized changes.
security_controls.relevance: Mandates controlled modification of account attributes consistent with organization-level settings.
security_controls.integration_tips: Enforce attribute change authorization, log profile changes, and include org-level policy enforcement in account services.
security_controls.verification_method: Audit change logs, test that unauthorized profile edits are blocked, and policy conformance checks.

security_controls.requirement: Management of privileged access rights and user profiles to ensure that changes to profiles are controlled and reviewed.
security_controls.relevance: Supports formal control and review of profile and organization-level changes for compliance.
security_controls.integration_tips: Define change approval processes for org settings, periodically review privileged profile changes, and keep records for audits.
security_controls.verification_method: Policy and procedural review, evidence of change reviews, and sample audits of profile modifications.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: Invitation and onboarding flow for adding collaborators to teams and boards

security_controls.requirement: Verify account provisioning and deprovisioning workflows, including secure invitation flows, email verification, and protections against token replay and forging.
security_controls.relevance: Directly matches secure invite flows, token handling, and protections needed during onboarding.
security_controls.integration_tips: Use single-use, time-limited invite tokens, tie invites to identity verification, and ensure replay protection and revocation for invites.
security_controls.verification_method: Test invite token lifecycle, inspect invite link generation and expiry, and attempt token replay attacks in QA.

security_controls.requirement: The organization controls the automated establishment, activation, modification, disabling, and removal of accounts, including invited users and external collaborators.
security_controls.relevance: Requires controlled automation for onboarding and offboarding which applies to collaborator invites.
security_controls.integration_tips: Implement automated provisioning tied to invite acceptance, ensure automated disabling on offboarding, and log lifecycle events.
security_controls.verification_method: Review provisioning logs, test automated disablement, and validate workflow completeness.

security_controls.requirement: Roles and responsibilities for user provisioning and deprovisioning including onboarding and offboarding procedures.
security_controls.relevance: Ensures the organization has defined roles and procedures for onboarding which affects invitations and collaborator management.
security_controls.integration_tips: Document responsibilities, include security checks in onboarding SOPs, and ensure coordination with access control systems.
security_controls.verification_method: Process documentation review and sample onboarding/offboarding records.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: Create, edit, duplicate, and delete boards with organization and project hierarchies

security_controls.requirement: Verify that object level access controls are enforced for create, read, update, delete operations. Ensure proper authorization checks on hierarchical resources and multi-tenant isolation.
security_controls.relevance: Applies to CRUD operations for boards and ensuring hierarchical access (org/project/board) is respected.
security_controls.integration_tips: Enforce server-side ACL checks per board and hierarchy, prevent horizontal privilege escalation, and scope actions to tenant boundaries.
security_controls.verification_method: Authorization unit tests, access control matrix validation, and privilege escalation pentesting.

security_controls.requirement: Access enforcement: The information system enforces assigned authorizations for controlling access to resources including hierarchical access.
security_controls.relevance: Mandates enforcement of assigned authorizations across hierarchical structures like organizations/projects.
security_controls.integration_tips: Map RBAC roles into access enforcement points, centralize authorization logic, and include ownership checks for delete/duplicate operations.
security_controls.verification_method: Policy-to-enforcement mapping review and tests to confirm unauthorized actions are blocked.

security_controls.requirement: Assets (including data and resources) shall be managed throughout their lifecycle with ownership and classification defined.
security_controls.relevance: Addresses lifecycle and ownership of boards as assets within organization/project hierarchies.
security_controls.integration_tips: Define board ownership metadata, classification levels, and lifecycle policies for create/duplicate/delete operations.
security_controls.verification_method: Asset inventory review and lifecycle policy conformance checks.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: Board sharing controls: private, team-only, public link with permissions (view/comment/edit)

security_controls.requirement: Verify access control models for sharing resources, including link-based sharing and anonymized access. Ensure permission scopes (read/comment/edit) are enforced and link tokens are unguessable and revocable.
security_controls.relevance: Directly maps to sharing modes (private/team/public link) and permission scopes enforcement.
security_controls.integration_tips: Implement scoped, time-limited share tokens, validate permissions server-side for each action, and provide revocation/rotation for shared links.
security_controls.verification_method: Token entropy testing, permission matrix tests, and revoke-and-test flows for links.

security_controls.requirement: Access control for mobile devices and collaboration tools including capabilities for remote access, sharing, and revocation of shared access.
security_controls.relevance: Ensures sharing features have revocation and remote access controls to prevent unauthorized access via links.
security_controls.integration_tips: Provide administrative controls for revoking shared access, maintain share audit logs, and apply cryptographic protections to link URLs.
security_controls.verification_method: Functional testing of sharing revocation, audit log checks, and URL/token strength review.

security_controls.requirement: Cryptographic protection of data during sharing and transmission to prevent unauthorized disclosure via shared links.
security_controls.relevance: Requires encryption of shared content and transport for public links.
security_controls.integration_tips: Use TLS for all transport, encrypt sensitive payloads when stored or delivered, and consider signed URLs with expiry.
security_controls.verification_method: Cryptography configuration review and TLS/URL signing tests.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: Board versioning, undo/redo, and change history with ability to restore prior versions

security_controls.requirement: Verify that data versioning and history functions maintain integrity and are protected against unauthorized tampering. Ensure the ability to restore prior versions with appropriate access controls.
security_controls.relevance: Directly addresses versioning, history, and restoration with integrity and authorization requirements.
security_controls.integration_tips: Store version metadata immutably or with tamper-evident mechanisms, restrict restore operations to authorized roles, and protect version stores from unauthorized changes.
security_controls.verification_method: Integrity checks of version store, restore operation tests, and tamper attempts in controlled tests.

security_controls.requirement: Information system monitoring for integrity and unauthorized modification; maintain versioning and mechanisms for rollback and recovery.
security_controls.relevance: Supports monitoring for unauthorized changes and rollback capabilities which are core to version history.
security_controls.integration_tips: Implement integrity monitoring and alerting for version stores, and maintain documented rollback procedures tested regularly.
security_controls.verification_method: Integrity monitoring logs review and rollback exercise results.

security_controls.requirement: Information system backup: Ensure backup and restoration processes that preserve version history and integrity.
security_controls.relevance: Backups and restores must preserve versioning to enable reliable restores of prior board states.
security_controls.integration_tips: Include versioned data in backups, verify backup integrity, and test restoration to known good states.
security_controls.verification_method: Backup logs, restoration tests, and integrity verification of restored versions.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: Board templates library for common use cases

security_controls.requirement: Verify secure handling of templates and reusable assets. Ensure templates don't embed sensitive default secrets and respect access controls.
security_controls.relevance: Ensures templates are sanitized and don't contain secrets or insecure defaults when used by multiple users/orgs.
security_controls.integration_tips: Scan templates for embedded secrets, apply access controls on template usage and editing, and provide safe defaults.
security_controls.verification_method: Template content scans, secrets detection tests, and permission checks on template library.

security_controls.requirement: Baseline configurations and managed configuration change for templates or reusable system components.
security_controls.relevance: Treats templates as configuration artifacts needing change control and baselining.
security_controls.integration_tips: Apply configuration management for templates, track versions, and require controlled changes via change control process.
security_controls.verification_method: Change logs for template updates and CM system audits.

security_controls.requirement: External component usage and secure configuration of acquired components and templates.
security_controls.relevance: Applies when templates are sourced externally—requires vetting and secure configuration.
security_controls.integration_tips: Vet third-party templates, require security review before adoption, and sanitize content.
security_controls.verification_method: Supplier/component review evidence and template vetting records.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: Real-time collaborative editing with low-latency synchronization and conflict resolution

security_controls.requirement: Verify secure synchronization protocols for real-time collaboration. Ensure conflict resolution preserves integrity and access control checks occur on authoritative servers.
security_controls.relevance: Directly relevant to real-time sync and conflict resolution ensuring security and integrity in collaborative edits.
security_controls.integration_tips: Use authoritative servers for conflict resolution, secure transport for sync messages, and well-defined merge semantics to avoid integrity bypass.
security_controls.verification_method: Protocol review, concurrency and conflict-resolution tests, and tamper-resistance checks.

security_controls.requirement: Use cryptographic mechanisms to protect the confidentiality and integrity of real-time communication and synchronization.
security_controls.relevance: Requires cryptographic protection of real-time messages used for collaborative editing.
security_controls.integration_tips: Apply TLS for transport, consider message signing and sequence integrity checks, and protect against replay attacks.
security_controls.verification_method: Network capture inspection for TLS use and message integrity test vectors.

security_controls.requirement: Ensure security in development of real-time systems including design for synchronization and conflict resolution.
security_controls.relevance: Provides organizational control over secure design and development practices for real-time components.
security_controls.integration_tips: Include threat modeling for sync protocols, code reviews for concurrency logic, and secure SDLC practices.
security_controls.verification_method: Secure design artifacts, threat models, and review of implementation against design.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: Presence indicators and live cursors for collaborators

security_controls.requirement: Verify that presence information and live cursors do not expose unintended PII and that disclosure is controlled by access policies and user privacy settings.
security_controls.relevance: Ensures presence and cursor data respect privacy and are restricted to authorized viewers.
security_controls.integration_tips: Allow users to opt-out of presence, limit presence visibility to team members, and avoid including personal identifiers in presence payloads.
security_controls.verification_method: Privacy tests, access control checks for presence streams, and PII scanning of presence data.

security_controls.requirement: Information sharing and collaborative capabilities must be controlled and restricted based on organizational policy to prevent unauthorized disclosure of presence data.
security_controls.relevance: Mandates control over collaborative data sharing—applies to presence indicators.
security_controls.integration_tips: Enforce sharing policies at server-side, include consent mechanisms, and log presence access.
security_controls.verification_method: Policy enforcement tests and audit logs of presence accesses.

security_controls.requirement: Privacy and protection of personally identifiable information shall be ensured when displaying presence or similar personal data.
security_controls.relevance: Covers legal/compliance aspects of showing personal data in presence features.
security_controls.integration_tips: Map presence data to PII policies, implement consent and data minimization, and document legal basis for presence processing.
security_controls.verification_method: Privacy impact assessment and legal/compliance review.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: In-board chat, commenting, @mentions and threaded discussions

security_controls.requirement: Verify that user-generated content (chat, comments, mentions) is properly validated and encoded to prevent XSS, injection, and other content-based attacks.
security_controls.relevance: Directly applies to preventing XSS and injection via chat/comment features.
security_controls.integration_tips: Apply strict input validation, context-aware output encoding, and sanitize mentions and rich-text formatting on the server.
security_controls.verification_method: Automated scanning for XSS, code review of sanitization functions, and fuzzing of message inputs.

security_controls.requirement: Protection of information at endpoints and during communication (including messaging) to ensure confidentiality and integrity.
security_controls.relevance: Requires secure transport and endpoint protections for messaging features.
security_controls.integration_tips: Use TLS for message transport, enforce authentication for chat sessions, and rate-limit to prevent spam/abuse.
security_controls.verification_method: Transport security tests, endpoint configuration reviews, and abuse/rate-limit testing.

security_controls.requirement: Information input validation and sanitization, including for messaging systems and user-generated content.
security_controls.relevance: Supports input sanitization and integrity checks required for chat/comment systems.
security_controls.integration_tips: Implement sanitization libraries, validate message attachments, and monitor for malicious content patterns.
security_controls.verification_method: Sanitization unit tests and monitoring logs for detected malicious inputs.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: Audio/video conferencing integration during sessions

security_controls.requirement: Verify that audio/video integrations use secure transport, appropriate encryption, and do not expose streams or credentials. Consider privacy impacts and permissions for media device access.
security_controls.relevance: Directly addresses secure conferencing integration, encryption and privacy considerations.
security_controls.integration_tips: Use SRTP/DTLS or vendor-provided encrypted channels, require explicit user consent for media access, and protect tokens used for media sessions.
security_controls.verification_method: Media session capture to confirm encryption, permissions workflow tests, and credential/token leakage checks.

security_controls.requirement: Public key infrastructure and secure channels for protecting multimedia sessions and real-time data.
security_controls.relevance: Specifies cryptographic mechanisms and channel protections for media streams.

security_controls.verification_method: Certificate validation checks and review of crypto usage for media channels.

security_controls.requirement: Control and monitor use of audio-visual equipment to prevent unauthorized recording and disclosure.
security_controls.relevance: Addresses organizational control over AV equipment and recordings which applies to conferencing integrations.
security_controls.integration_tips: Implement recording policies, provide visible recording indicators, and restrict recording to authorized roles.
security_controls.verification_method: Policy documentation, recorded session access logs, and checks for recording consent.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: Infinite canvas with pan/zoom and high-performance rendering

security_controls.requirement: Denial of service protection and resource management controls to mitigate resource exhaustion attacks.

security_controls.requirement: Capacity management to ensure systems can handle expected loads and scale to mitigate performance degradation.

security_controls.requirement: Input validation and sanitization to prevent malicious data from compromising system integrity.

security_controls.verification_method: Network segregation review and content proxy configuration inspection.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: File upload and asset management with common format support (PNG, JPG, PDF, DOCX, etc.)

security_controls.requirement: Verify secure file upload handling: validate content-types, perform virus/malware scanning, store files safely, and enforce size/format restrictions.
security_controls.relevance: Directly covers secure handling of uploads and asset stores for the specified file types.
security_controls.integration_tips: Validate MIME types and file signatures, integrate anti-malware scanning, store files in isolated object storage with least privilege, and enforce strict size/format policies.
security_controls.verification_method: Upload fuzzing, malware scan logs review, and access control checks for stored assets.

security_controls.requirement: Malicious code protection: Employ anti-malware tools for files and attachments, and validate uploaded content.
security_controls.relevance: Mandates protective controls against malicious content in uploaded files.
security_controls.integration_tips: Integrate industry-standard malware scanners into upload pipeline and re-scan files on access where possible.
security_controls.verification_method: Malware detection logs and testing with known-malicious samples in safe environment.

security_controls.requirement: Protection of information at rest: encryption and access control for stored files and assets.
security_controls.relevance: Ensures stored files are protected by encryption and access controls.
security_controls.integration_tips: Encrypt assets at rest using KMS-backed keys and enforce object storage ACLs mapped to application RBAC.
security_controls.verification_method: Storage encryption configuration review and ACL policy tests.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: Export boards as images or PDFs and support version control for uploaded files

security_controls.chapter: Data Export and Data Loss Prevention
security_controls.requirement: Verify secure export functionality to prevent unintended data leakage. Ensure exports respect access controls, include watermarking or redaction where needed, and are logged.
security_controls.relevance: Directly relevant to secure export (PDF/images) and preventing data leakage during export operations.
security_controls.integration_tips: Enforce access checks prior to export, include optional watermarking for sensitive exports, and log/export operations with owner info.
security_controls.verification_method: Attempt unauthorized exports, review export logs, and confirm watermarking/redaction applies when configured.

security_controls.requirement: Media sanitization and protection during transfer including control over exportable content and integrity checks.
security_controls.relevance: Ensures media/exported files are handled securely during transfer and storage.
security_controls.integration_tips: Use secure transfer channels, perform integrity checks on generated exports, and manage retention and disposal of exported files.
security_controls.verification_method: Transport encryption checks and integrity verification of exported files.

security_controls.requirement: Prevent unauthorized data exfiltration by controlling export mechanisms and monitoring exports.
security_controls.relevance: Specifies controls to avoid exports becoming a data exfiltration channel.
security_controls.integration_tips: Alert on bulk export activity, apply rate-limits for exports, and require elevated permissions for exports of sensitive data.
security_controls.verification_method: Monitoring rules tests and simulated bulk-export detection exercises.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: Integrations with productivity tools (Jira, Asana, Trello), cloud storage (Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive), and communication platforms (Slack, Teams)

security_controls.requirement: Verify secure integration with third-party services: least privilege scopes, secure token handling, and revocation mechanisms for connected apps.
security_controls.relevance: Directly covers secure connectors and OAuth scope management for integrations.
security_controls.integration_tips: Request minimal OAuth scopes, store third-party tokens securely with rotation, and provide admin controls to revoke integrations.
security_controls.verification_method: OAuth scope audits, token storage review, and revocation workflow tests.

security_controls.requirement: Ensure security requirements for external system integrations and component acquisition; vet third-party services.
security_controls.relevance: Mandates vetting and contractual controls for third-party integrations.
security_controls.integration_tips: Perform security assessments of integration partners and include security SLAs in agreements.
security_controls.verification_method: Supplier assessment records and contractual evidence.

security_controls.requirement: Identify and manage security within supplier relationships, including third-party integration agreements and controls.
security_controls.relevance: Provides governance for supplier and integration security, applicable to tool integrations.
security_controls.integration_tips: Maintain inventory of integrations, apply SLA/security clauses, and monitor integration activity.
security_controls.verification_method: Integration inventory and supplier security review evidence.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: Public API for custom integrations and automation with secure token management

security_controls.requirement: Verify secure API authentication and token management: use OAuth2, rotate and revoke credentials, and implement scopes and rate limits.
security_controls.relevance: Directly applies to public API authentication, token lifecycle, and scope enforcement.
security_controls.integration_tips: Issue OAuth2 tokens with short lifetimes and refresh tokens, implement revocation endpoints, and store secrets securely in KMS.
security_controls.verification_method: API token lifecycle tests, revocation checks, and penetration tests on API auth endpoints.

security_controls.requirement: Authenticator management for APIs and services including token issuance and lifecycle.
security_controls.relevance: Mandates management of authenticators used by APIs which is core to secure token management.
security_controls.integration_tips: Define token issuance policies, rotate keys, and monitor token usage for anomalies.
security_controls.verification_method: Review of token issuance logs, rotation schedules, and anomaly detection alerts.

security_controls.requirement: Session and connection controls for managing API sessions and tokens including timeouts and revocation.
security_controls.relevance: Supports session control and lifecycle handling for API tokens.
security_controls.integration_tips: Enforce token timeouts, implement token revocation endpoints, and log session/token-related events.
security_controls.verification_method: Session/token tests and review of revocation workflow.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: Fine-grained access control and ownership transfer for boards

security_controls.requirement: Verify fine-grained authorization controls and ownership transfer mechanisms. Ensure delegation, transfer, and revocation are auditable and enforced server-side.
security_controls.relevance: Directly mandates server-enforced fine-grained ACLs and auditable ownership transfer workflows.
security_controls.integration_tips: Provide ACL models with explicit owner fields, require confirmation/authorization for transfers, and log transfer events.
security_controls.verification_method: Ownership transfer tests, ACL enforcement tests, and audit log inspection for transfer events.

security_controls.requirement: Separation of duties and explicit delegation mechanisms to support transferable ownership and delegated privileges.
security_controls.relevance: Supports delegation and separation of duties needed when transferring ownership.
security_controls.integration_tips: Implement approval workflows for delegation and use role separation to prevent conflicts of interest.
security_controls.verification_method: Review delegation workflows and test separation of duties constraints.

security_controls.requirement: Audit record generation and analysis for reporting systems and dashboards; ensure integrity and controlled access.
security_controls.relevance: Requires auditability for ownership transfer and ACL changes.
security_controls.integration_tips: Ensure ownership transfers create immutable audit events with actor and timestamp and retain them per retention policy.
security_controls.verification_method: Audit log review and correlation of ownership change events.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: Audit logging for user activity, changes, and administrative actions

security_controls.requirement: Verify audit logging captures user activities, administrative actions, and critical changes; logs are tamper-evident and protected.
security_controls.relevance: Direct mapping for audit logging requirements in the high-level list.
security_controls.integration_tips: Log auth events, CRUD operations, and admin actions to immutable sinks (WORM or append-only), protect logs, and forward to centralized SIEM.
security_controls.verification_method: Log sampling and tamper tests, SIEM configuration review, and retention checks.

security_controls.requirement: Audit events: The organization defines auditable events and records user activities and administrative actions.
security_controls.relevance: Specifies which events to capture and how to manage them—applies to all audit logging needs.
security_controls.integration_tips: Define auditable events matrix, implement reliable logging, and include timestamps and actor identifiers.
security_controls.verification_method: Event coverage reviews and checking logs for required fields.

security_controls.requirement: Protection of audit information: logs must be protected from unauthorized access and tampering.
security_controls.relevance: Ensures logs are secure which is critical for trustworthy audit trails.
security_controls.integration_tips: Restrict log access, use checksums/signing for tamper detection, and separate duties for log management.
security_controls.verification_method: Access control review on log stores and integrity-check implementation tests.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: Configurable notifications (in-app, email) and integration-driven notifications (Slack, Teams)

security_controls.requirement: Verify notification mechanisms respect privacy settings and do not leak sensitive information. Provide user-configurable preferences and secure delivery channels.
security_controls.relevance: Directly applies to notifications and their privacy/security implications.
security_controls.integration_tips: Allow fine-grained notification preferences, redact sensitive content in notifications, and use secure channels for delivery (TLS, signed webhooks).
security_controls.verification_method: Review notification templates for PII, test opt-in/opt-out flows, and inspect webhook signing.

security_controls.requirement: Define notification and communication policies including handling of sensitive data in notifications.
security_controls.relevance: Encourages organizational policy controlling notification contents and channels.
security_controls.integration_tips: Document allowed notification types, classify sensitive content, and implement checks to prevent sensitive fields in messages.
security_controls.verification_method: Policy existence check and sample notification content review.

security_controls.requirement: Privacy compliance and controls for processing personal data in communications and notifications.
security_controls.relevance: Ensures notifications comply with privacy requirements when transmitting personal data.
security_controls.integration_tips: Document legal basis for sending notifications, obtain consents where required, and provide data minimization in notifications.
security_controls.verification_method: Privacy impact assessment and consent records.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: Performance and scalability goals: horizontal scaling, efficient sync, conflict resolution, and large-board performance

security_controls.requirement: Verify design for horizontal scalability, efficient synchronization, and resource isolation to maintain security and performance under load.
security_controls.relevance: Directly covers scalability, sync efficiency, and resource isolation required for high-performance collaborative systems.
security_controls.integration_tips: Design stateless services, use sharding/partitioning for large boards, instrument sync performance, and ensure security controls scale with capacity.
security_controls.verification_method: Scalability/load tests and review of architecture for statelessness and partitioning.

security_controls.requirement: Contingency and continuity planning for maintaining operations during scaling events and failures.
security_controls.relevance: Requires plans to maintain service during scaling/failure events to meet availability targets.
security_controls.integration_tips: Develop contingency plans for scale events, test failover and degradation scenarios, and include performance SLAs in runbooks.
security_controls.verification_method: Contingency plan tests and failover simulation outcomes.

security_controls.requirement: Capacity and performance management to ensure systems can scale and meet performance/security requirements.
security_controls.relevance: Operational control for capacity planning and ongoing performance management.
security_controls.integration_tips: Maintain capacity forecasts, automated scaling triggers, and continuous monitoring of sync latencies for large boards.
security_controls.verification_method: Capacity planning evidence and monitoring dashboards.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: Reporting and analytics (usage, activity logs, license/admin dashboards) with export capability

security_controls.requirement: Verify that reporting and analytics systems protect aggregated data, prevent leakage of PII, and support secure export and access controls.
security_controls.relevance: Applies to dashboards, exports and analytics with privacy and access concerns.
security_controls.integration_tips: Apply role-based access to dashboards, anonymize/pseudonymize PII in reports, and control export rights with audit logging.
security_controls.verification_method: Report content reviews for PII, access control tests, and export permission tests.

security_controls.requirement: Audit record generation and analysis for reporting systems and dashboards; ensure integrity and controlled access.
security_controls.relevance: Ensures analytics derive from trustworthy audit records and logs are protected.
security_controls.integration_tips: Ensure logs feeding analytics are integrity-protected and limit access to analytics data based on roles.
security_controls.verification_method: Validation of log feed integrity and access control audits on dashboards.

security_controls.requirement: Privacy requirements for processing personal data in reporting and analytics.
security_controls.relevance: Ensures compliance for analytics involving personal data, including exports.
security_controls.integration_tips: Maintain data processing records, implement pseudonymization, and enforce retention/erasures as required.
security_controls.verification_method: DPIA results and data processing records.

requirements_mapping.high_level_requirement: Operational capabilities: backups, restore, monitoring, rate limiting, and DDoS mitigation

security_controls.requirement: Verify backup, restore, monitoring, rate limiting, and DoS mitigation are implemented to maintain availability and integrity of data and services.
security_controls.relevance: Directly maps to the operational capabilities requested, ensuring resilience and protection from DoS and data loss.
security_controls.integration_tips: Implement automated backups with periodic restore tests, centralized monitoring and alerting, rate limiting at API gateways, and DDoS protection (WAF/CDN).
security_controls.verification_method: Restore drills, monitoring configuration review, rate-limit effectiveness testing, and DDoS response exercises.

security_controls.requirement: Information system backup: ensure backups are performed, tested, and restorations validated to maintain data availability.
security_controls.relevance: Mandates backups and restore validation as part of contingency planning.
security_controls.integration_tips: Schedule regular backups, encrypt backups, and maintain tested restore procedures in runbooks.
security_controls.verification_method: Backup/restore test records and integrity checks.

security_controls.requirement: Denial of service protection and resource management controls for mitigating large-scale attacks.
security_controls.relevance: Specifies protections to mitigate DDoS—including rate limiting and resource management.
security_controls.integration_tips: Deploy API rate limiting, autoscaling, network-layer DDoS protections (scrubbing services) and implement resource quotas per tenant.
security_controls.verification_method: DDoS simulation tests, rate-limit verification and resource isolation tests.

security_controls.chapter: Information Security Aspects of Business Continuity
security_controls.requirement: Implement information security continuity including backup and restore procedures and protection against disruptions.
security_controls.relevance: Provides continuity planning guidance that includes backups and protection against disruptions like DDoS.
security_controls.integration_tips: Integrate information security into business continuity plans, test continuity plans regularly, and ensure roles are assigned for restore operations.
security_controls.verification_method: Business continuity test evidence and recovery time objective (RTO) verification.

cross_functional_controls.description: Centralized logging, tamper-evident logs, SIEM ingestion, alerting and retention policies to detect and investigate security events.
applies_to: Audit logging for user activity, changes, and administrative actions
Operational capabilities: backups, restore, monitoring, rate limiting, and DDoS mitigation
cross_functional_controls.implementation_guidance: Forward application, auth, and infrastructure logs to a centralized, access-controlled SIEM. Sign or checksum logs to detect tampering, configure alerts for anomalous activity, and retain logs per policy for forensic needs.

cross_functional_controls.description: Use strong TLS for all transports and encrypt sensitive data at rest using KMS-managed keys to protect confidentiality and integrity.
cross_functional_controls.implementation_guidance: Enforce TLS 1.2+ with secure cipher suites, use KMS for key management, rotate keys regularly, and apply envelope encryption for large assets.

cross_functional_controls.description: Validate and sanitize all inputs and apply context-aware output encoding to prevent XSS, injection, and malformed data affecting rendering.
cross_functional_controls.implementation_guidance: Adopt whitelist validation, use proven sanitizer libraries for HTML/SVG, and encode outputs per context (HTML, JS, URL).

cross_functional_controls.description: Enforce server-side RBAC/ACL checks, least privilege, ownership controls and auditable delegation/transfer mechanisms.
cross_functional_controls.implementation_guidance: Centralize authorization logic, maintain role/permission matrices, protect admin functions, and log/monitor changes to access control policies.
